subject: docs(guide): expand vocabulary and add cross-domain guidance
body:
Expand the standard label vocabulary with 6 cross-domain additions
(Theory, Law, Process, Movement, Artwork, Era) so AIs researching
non-business topics have anchors to standardize against instead of
inventing labels from scratch.

Expand connection title vocabulary with 9 cross-domain verbs
(caused, led to, influenced, opposes, supports, discovered,
references, governs, studied) covering causal, analytical,
scientific, and comparative relationships.

Expand property key vocabulary with 6 additions (medium, era,
jurisdiction, field, methodology, outcome) for arts, legal,
and scientific domains.

Add "Applying to other domains" section with a table showing how
the format maps to science, history, arts, law, and philosophy.

Add source attribution guidance to both Markdown and JSON tips
(use `source` property for primary references, inline citations
in body text).

Add "What deserves its own item" heuristic so AIs can decide
when to create a heading vs keep something as body text or a
property.
